game_description: Features • New age Tower Defense! • 70 unique levels. • 7 different beaches. • Control 6 weapons simultaneously. • 3 upgrade slots per weapon. • Buy any of 4 different towers to help you. • 5 total slots to place your towers. • 3 game save slots. Weapons • Dual machine guns – good for taking out incoming ground troops. • Main Cannon – Good for taking out vehicles and aircraft. • Mortar Cannon – Great for taking out buildings and heavy artillery. • Rocket Launcher – Exceptional for all aerial enemies. • Grenade Launcher – Excellent for large clusters of ground troops. Towers • Walls – Protect you from incoming enemies. • Gun Tower – Shoot and kill ground soldiers. • Turret Tower – Shoots at all grounded vehicles. • AA Gun – Shoots at planes and choppers. Beaches • Stoddard Island • Spider Island • Blizzard Island • Bullet Island • Long Piece Island • Double Pass Island • Death Island Basic Training Before you start, learn how to use each weapon.
